remarks: Define the Lebesgue integral for simple functions.  A simple function is a finite linear combination of indicator functions for finitely measurable sets, whose assigned value is the sum of the measures of the sets times their respective weights.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jun-2014.)
